page: AG60054: Design Of Aquacultural Facilities And

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequsites: None Pumps: Centrifugal, Turbine, Propellor, Air-Lift, Selection and Application in Aquacultural Farms, Blowers and Air-Compressors: Types and Uses, Earch Moving Equipment: Uses in Farm Construction. Weed Control Equipment. Tanks, Raceways: Material of Construction and Water Circulation Systems, Fish Ladder, Fish Lifts, Design, Construction and Operation of Hatchery, Fish Seed Transport, Feed Mill Equipment: Pellet Mill, Screw Extruder, Hammer Mill and Mixers, Screening and Conveying Equipment, Dryers, Fish Feeders.
page: AG60054: Design Of Aquacultural Facilities And
